name: Kart-Toons Racer: Whip to Win
description:
Kart-Toons Racer is 3D racing game playable up to 4 players that takes place in a foreign cartoony universe.

Play as the most evil of all villains invited to compete in a race for fame and glory!

 You can play as two characters, the dominatrix and the master swimmer, who have different skills, so a different playstyle in a wild race.

Any tricks are allowed ! Push your opponents, take shortcuts, but beware to not strain too much your mount, who knows what could happen ?

Features :

         • Select your character
         • Drive like a pro !
         • Attack your opponents
         • Use your skills !

CREDITS :

Developped by : Dov Benzaquen - Wilhelm THOMASEAU - Florian Ribeiro

Design by : Rafael De Oliveira Reis

Graphics by : Cédric ARNOUX

Produced by : Maxime Gaulier

**The game's still in development**
